name: Netplay
description: Enable/disable netplay for multiplayer gaming over WiFi.
author: mohammadsyuhada

changelog.v1.1.0: Add NextUI v6.7.4 support, fix netplay connection reliability issues, and improve patch version compatibility
changelog.v1.0.2: Add multi-platform build support for tg5040 and tg5050
changelog.v1.0.1: Updated netplay settings and fixed connection issues
